Text:
At about 6 minutes into the film Hipatia is seen exiting a bath exposing a fully nude backside as well as partial side view including breast. The camera stays on the lower rear for a slight moment which gives a hint of frontal detail.

Mid movie when Christians are seen raising up against Jews in the city a woman is seen being stripped of her clothing and thrown to the ground. Some buttocks is shown. Very quick.

At the end of the movie Hipatia is stripped nude before a crowd of Christians. She is shown nude from the rear, covering her breasts with her arms.
